entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, Old Crow
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:28 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Occasional drifting snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 7:28 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:28 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
